title: San Diego Payment Processing
metaDescription: SideGuy Solutions helps San Diego operators lower fees, speed up settlements, and modernize payment rails.
h1: San Diego Payment Processing for Real Operators
subhead: Lower fees, faster settlements, and smarter payments built for San Diego businesses.
introHtml: If you run a business in San Diego, you already know payments are broken: slow deposits, random holds, and mystery fees. SideGuy exists to fix that.
bodyHtml:
We plug you into faster rails (including Solana where it makes sense), clear pricing, and lower risk. You keep more of each transaction and see your money sooner.

We don’t sell theory. We install real, working systems and show you the before/after in dollars.

title: AC Repair San Diego
metaDescription: AC not working in San Diego? SideGuy helps you get fast, real help and better systems behind your home services.
h1: AC Repair Help in San Diego
subhead: Smart routing, local operators, and a real human layer when your AC stops playing nice.
introHtml: When your AC dies in the heat, you don’t want a blog post — you want a fix. That’s why this page exists.
bodyHtml: We help you quickly connect with reliable local operators and build a better flow for how service calls, payments, and follow-ups work in your home or business.

title: SideGuy Money Index
metaDescription: Track how SideGuy thinks about money, risk, EV, and long-term compounding across bets, payments, and automation.
subhead: One place to think clearly about risk, edge, and compounding.
introHtml: The Money Index is where we log how systems perform over time: bets, flows, automations, and experiments.
bodyHtml: We’re not here to chase spikes. We use data, logs, and simple, repeatable rules to make better decisions over time. This page will grow as the system grows.
